TopicTitle: [WRN 17:30:57.284] Vessel Untitled Space Craft was removed from the game: it was debris cluttering up KSC.

Articles.Content:
Ok, so now, for some really odd reason, the hovercraft I"m working on are being considered debris even with a pilot sitting inside.

Any ideas what the root cause of this is?

And yes, I do have: 

MODULE
{
    name = ModuleCommand
    minimumCrew = 1
}

in the pod's .cfg

Edited October 19, 2017 by Fengist

16 hours ago, Fengist said:

Ok, so now, for some really odd reason, the hovercraft I"m working on are being considered debris even with a pilot sitting inside.

Any ideas what the root cause of this is?

And yes, I do have: 


MODULE
{
    name = ModuleCommand
    minimumCrew = 1
}

in the pod's .cfg

As I had posted in your other thread, this is likely related to manipulation of the 'landed' state.

It is -super- touchy.  Like absolutely neurotic.  Seriously, if everything isn't done perfectly it'll blow up.
